articles.description: Matthew and Camila McConaughey’s tequila, Pantalones, is anything but subtle. After all, the husband and wife cofounders stand proudly pantsless in many of their ads as a cheeky away to promote the nearly two-year-old brand.
articles.content:
Its tough out there to be a tequila maker not even Kendall Jenner is immune from the industrys challenges.
818 Tequila, the four-year-old brand owned by Jenner, has slowed down hiring and dialed bac… [+3875 chars]
